doji.description: Classic doji showing market indecision after an uptrend in Apple stock

hammer.description: Bullish hammer at support level for Microsoft stock
hammer.outcome: Started a 15% rally over the next two weeks

bullish_engulfing.description: Strong bullish engulfing pattern at market bottom for S&P 500 ETF
bullish_engulfing.outcome: Marked the beginning of a recovery rally
